Kup was having a hard time understanding Elita between her sobs. He tried to comfort her.

::Rodimus Prime::

With the fight outside finished, Rodimus headed into the city. He opens a comm to Doc.

Rodimus: Doc, I think you can stand down. Everything seems to be under control.

Rodimus opens a seperate channel to Nightlight, not knowing anything of the mission to help Windlord and Kup.

Rodimus: Nightlight, how are things in the city?
